com.scalar.db.api

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.db.api.Operation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mutation, Selection

    @NotThreadSafe
public abstract class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction for storage operations.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this object. The other object is considered equal if:
        • it is also an Operation and
        • both instances have the same partition key, clustering key, namespace, table name and consistency
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be tested for equality
        Returns:
        true if the other object is "equal to" this object otherwise false
